name: beanbag
content:
beanbag noun [C]
(SEAT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also beanbag chair) a soft seat consisting of a large cloth bag filled with dried beans or something similar
John_Kasawa/iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

beanbag noun [C]
(TOY)
a small bag filled with dried beans or similar objects, used as a children's toy
Douglas Sacha/Moment/GettyImages
